result.execSummary:
The defendant Gerardo Vazquez-Guerrero was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Failure to Report to Jail, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.425(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

Complete any assessment, treatment, counseling deemed necessary by agent.  Complete AODA with follow through.  Complete anger management treatment.

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk: Kimberly
Case Called: 10:04am
INCLUDES 18CM70 & 15CF1084
State appears by ADA Davis Runde; Defendant appears in person, in custody, with Atty Lou Ann Bohn. Spanish interpreter- Sarah Chwaszczewski appears.

Spanish interpreter sworn in and interprets 
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
State moves to:
18CM70:
Ct. 1 Criminal Damage to Property >> D&RI
COURT grants above

PLEA:
15CF1084:
Ct. 1 Failure to Report to Jail >> GUILTY

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
Parties make argument on jail credit if deft would be revoked from probation

COURT ORDERS: w/hold sentencing. 2 years probation. CONDITIONS: Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary by agent. Complete AODA assessment with follow through. Complete anger management treatment. Pay CC. Pay DNA surcharge and sample already on file at MCSD. If revoked, zero days credit granted. 
Adj: 10:27am
Plea hearing on April 10, 2018 at 10:00 am.
